snippet: BIGGAR--John Andrew, July 22, 1937 - February 6, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Sarah Harvey Biggar, died peacefully of natural causes in Norwalk, CT. With love and gratitude from his second family, the Beards, to John and those who cared for him at The Greens at Cannondale. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BIGGAR--John Andrew, July 22, 1937 - February 6, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Sarah Harvey Biggar, died peacefully of natural causes in Norwalk, CT. With love and gratitude from his second family, the Beards, to John and those who cared for him at The Greens at Cannondale. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BIGGAR, JOHN ANDREW
